### <span style="color: darkblue;">**Social, Emotional, and  Affective Health Lab (SEAHL).** </span> Rowan University
<font size="4"> 
We work with Dr. Katherine Gotham's lab conducting research evaluating the role of repetitive thinking and explanatory style in the development of depression in adults with Autism Spectrum Disorders. 
</font>

<br>
<br>

### <span style="color: darkblue;">**Asthma Research Center.** </span> Vanderbilt University Medical Center
<font size="4">
We work with Dr. Tina Hartert's [Asthma Research Center](https://www.vumc.org/aehr/welcome) on research aimed at understanding environmental contributors to the development of pediatric asthma and allergic diseases. 
</font>
